DOC.brief_summary: This study compare high-protein/low-carbohydrate diet ( modified paleolithic diet , MPD ) diet high slow carbohydrate ( Nordic Nutrition Recommendations , NNR ) . The diet compare respect effect weight reduction , metabolic regulation , long-term compliance diet regime . Seventy-two postmenopausal overweight healthy woman recruit follow two year . The following variable study : - Anthropometry - DEXA - OGTT - Liver fat content measure 1H-MRS - Hepatic 11Î²-HSD1 activity , measure cortisone/cortisol conversion test
DOC.brief_title: Diet Composition - Metabolic Regulation Long-term Compliance
DOC.criteria: Female Postmenopausal BMI > 28 Disease Gravidity Smoking Prescribed medication
